definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)

sentences.english: The AU says it would not administer the carbon cash directly.
sentences.chinese: 非盟表示不會直接負責管理這筆碳排放補償費。

sentences.english: There is a striking real contradiction of land compensation in our countrys requisition of rural land.
sentences.chinese: 我國農地徵用中有關土地補償費的現實矛盾十分突出。

sentences.english: The organizer will not pay the design compensation cost of disqualified bidding schemes.
sentences.chinese: 不合格的投標文件，主辦方不予支付設計成本補償費。

definition: to assign/to allocate/to transfer (money to an account)
rotation of crops (to preserve fertility of soil)
(of a sum of money etc) receivable
taxation/in former times, esp. land tax
environmental impact assessment EIA/abbr. to 環評|环评
pinyin: huan2 jing4 ying3 xiang3 ping2 gu1

definition: to deal with/to wait on/to provide for
